Package com.github.actionfx.core.annotation

Annotation Type AFXNestedView

  • @Repeatable(AFXNestedViews.class)
@Target({TYPE,FIELD})
@Retention(RUNTIME)
public @interface AFXNestedView
    Repeatable annotation to define a nested view. Nested views can be used to composite the overall scene graph view.

    You can either use this annotation on a class that is additionally annotated by AFXController annotation, or you can apply it to a field that is also annotated by @FXML. On class-level, this annotation is repeatable and can define one or many views to nest.

    Author:
    MartinKoster

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      java.lang.String refViewId
      The referenced view ID that shall nested in the view.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      double attachToAnchorBottom
      Optional anchor bottom in case the target node is an AnchorPane.
      double attachToAnchorLeft
      Optional anchor left in case the target node is an AnchorPane.
      double attachToAnchorRight
      Optional anchor right in case the target node is an AnchorPane.
      double attachToAnchorTop
      Optional anchor top in case the target node is an AnchorPane.
      BorderPanePosition attachToBorderPanePosition
      Optional border pane position in case the target node is a BorderPane.
      int attachToColumn
      Optional column index in case the target node is a GridPane.
      int attachToIndex
      Optional index referring to the target node's children list, where the view shall be attached to.
      java.lang.String attachToNodeWithId
      The parent node ID where the nested view shall be attached to.
      int attachToRow
      Optional row index in case the target node is a GridPane.

    • Element Detail

      • refViewId

        java.lang.String refViewId
        The referenced view ID that shall nested in the view.
        Returns:
        the view ID.

      • attachToNodeWithId

        java.lang.String attachToNodeWithId
        The parent node ID where the nested view shall be attached to. Please note that this ID is a real node ID in the JavaFX scenegraph.

        This field is mandatory, if this annotation is used on class-level together with a AFXController annotation.

        If used on a field annotated by @FXML, this value is irrelevant.

        Returns:
        the ID
        Default:
        ""

      • attachToIndex

        int attachToIndex
        Optional index referring to the target node's children list, where the view shall be attached to.
        Returns:
        the index in the target node's children list
        Default:
        -1

      • attachToColumn

        int attachToColumn
        Optional column index in case the target node is a GridPane. Must be used together with attachToRow().
        Returns:
        the column index in the target GridPane, where the view shall be attached to
        Default:
        -1

      • attachToRow

        int attachToRow
        Optional row index in case the target node is a GridPane. Must be used together with attachToColumn().
        Returns:
        the row index in the target GridPane, where the view shall be attached to
        Default:
        -1

      • attachToBorderPanePosition

        BorderPanePosition attachToBorderPanePosition
        Optional border pane position in case the target node is a BorderPane.
        Returns:
        the BorderPanePosition, where the view shall be attached to
        Default:
        com.github.actionfx.core.view.BorderPanePosition.NONE

      • attachToAnchorLeft

        double attachToAnchorLeft
        Optional anchor left in case the target node is an AnchorPane. Must be used together with attachToAnchorTop(), attachToAnchorRight() and attachToAnchorBottom().
        Returns:
        the left anchor
        Default:
        -1.0

      • attachToAnchorTop

        double attachToAnchorTop
        Optional anchor top in case the target node is an AnchorPane. Must be used together with attachToAnchorLeft(), attachToAnchorRight() and attachToAnchorBottom().
        Returns:
        the top anchor
        Default:
        -1.0

      • attachToAnchorRight

        double attachToAnchorRight
        Optional anchor right in case the target node is an AnchorPane. Must be used together with attachToAnchorTop(), attachToAnchorLeft() and attachToAnchorBottom().
        Returns:
        the right anchor
        Default:
        -1.0

      • attachToAnchorBottom

        double attachToAnchorBottom
        Optional anchor bottom in case the target node is an AnchorPane. Must be used together with attachToAnchorTop(), attachToAnchorRight() and attachToAnchorLeft().
        Returns:
        the bottom anchor
        Default:
        -1.0
